title: Quick Transmigration: Report to the Host, You Have Been Attacked! - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adventurers   Ancient China   Apocalypse   Clingy Lover   Cultivation   Episodic   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Military   Models   Multiple Realms   Mysterious Past   Overpowered Protagonist   Psychic Powers   Psychopaths   Reincarnation   Ruthless Protagonist   Showbiz   Soldiers   System Administrator   Transmigration   Vampires   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping   Zombies
author: 小橙汁儿
description:
As a system that is very spicy, it is actually bound by the Lord God to a host that is an even spicier chicken!

The system said ruthlessly: I don’t want to live!

Unexpectedly, the host actually promises to make it the master of the plane and the most powerful!

The System: Well, I will believe in you this time. I want to become the master of the plane!

However, why does the host destroy every plane that she disagrees with?!

Did you want to ruin me and still make me the main god of the plane?

Xi Ying: I don’t like this world, but I like you. Since you like this world, then I will leave it for you.

辣雞 [là jī]: Spicy chicken. This Internet slang term is a humorous way of saying 垃圾 [lā ji] “tr*sh, douchebags, contemptible people.”>
